00011 /**
00012  * nano-helper for javascript. simply add() javascript in your view, and get() it inside the head-section of your layout
00013  * @author mnt@codeninja.de
00014  * @package kata
00015  */
00016 
00017 class JsHelper extends Helper {
00018 
00019              private $js='';
00020 
00021 /**
00022  * add javascript to buffer inside a view
00023  */
00024              function add($js) {
00025                           $this->js = $this->js."\n".$js;
00026              }
00027 
00028 /**
00029  * return buffer. for use in your layout:
00030  * <code>
00031  * ...inside head-element inside your layout
00032  * [script type="application/javascript"]
00033  * echo $js->get();
00034  * [/script]
00035  * </code>
00036  */
00037              function get() {
00038                 return $this->js;
00039              }

00041 }
